title: Lincoln's WARNING #100056: Social Media Algorithm Changes
script: Social Media Algorithm Changes? Let me explain the CON: They got you arguing about CRUMBS while they eating the whole CAKE! Left vs Right? That's the SHOW! Real fight is UP vs DOWN, but they keep you fighting LEFT vs RIGHT! WAKE UP! Bitcoin below. Listen up. Social Media Algorithm Changes... another distraction from the real theft. While you panic, they're laughing to the bank. Wake up. Bitcoin below.
